snippet: The authorities arrested a 93-year-old former Nazi soldier on Monday, saying they had evidence that he had worked as a guard at Auschwitz and was complicit in murders there.
abstract: German authorities arrest Hans Lipschis, 93-year-old former Nazi soldier, saying that they have evidence he had worked as a guard at Auschwitz concentration camp and was complicit in murders there.
lead_paragraph: The authorities arrested a 93-year-old former Nazi soldier on Monday, saying they had evidence that he had worked as a guard at Auschwitz and was complicit in murders there.

headline.seo: Germany: Ex-Nazi With Link to Auschwitz Is Arrested
headline.main: Germany: Ex-Nazi With Link to Auschwitz Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Germany: Ex-Nazi With Link to Auschwitz Is Arrested
